attributes.action: Bring in a Law so that Mortgage Lenders pass on interest rate cuts in FULL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The only people benefitting from these cuts are the banks, the ones who got us in this mess are the only beneficiaries - make them pass on the rate cuts to the rest of us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
